data.name: Alexey's Winter: Night adventure
data.detailed_description:
NO TO WAR IN UKRAINE! #StopTheWar

----------------------------------------------------------------

Alexey's Winter: Night Adventure


An atmospheric point and click adventure game. You can interact with items and talk to different characters. The graphics are completely pencil drawn. The quest takes place on a dark and snowy night somewhere in the post-soviet Ukraine.

Episodes


The game consists of 3 episodes. While in each episode there is an end goal that needs to be accoumplished, the game is focussing on the typical daily life, small incidents and the overall atmosphere. The story is often non-linear, so the overall experience can be versatile.

About


The pace is relaxing and the game is filled with ironic dialogues and unexpected events. While the game preserves the typical Soviet atmosphere it should not be taken too seriously.

The game can be played either in English, Ukrainian or in Russian and all it needs for input is a mouse.

data.short_description: A dark snowy winter somewhere in the post-soviet Ukraine. This is where an atmospheric 2D Point-and-Click adventure starts. The game consists of 3 episodes, is non-violent, non political and easy to play. The graphics are completely pencil drawn. NO TO WAR IN UKRAINE
data.reviews:
“The game has a charm and the effort and authenticity surrounding the characters, locations, and events really add to a memorable experience. The premise is so simple but from it grows a compelling narrative. I would like to see more adventures starring Alexey.”
Brokenowly

“It’s full of intriguing, if somewhat confusing puzzles, that really get those brain cogs ticking over, and graphically, I’d go as far as saying it’s a masterpiece.”
Fullsync

“Alexey's Winter: Night Adventure is a very nice adventure, the player will quickly become fond of Alexey. Following him throughout his journey in the snowy streets of the former Soviet Union is a real pleasure.”
DMT | Graphic Adventure

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: 2.0Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB memory
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Intel HD 2000/3000 and older cards not supported
